MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder UseAutoincrement (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder columnBuilder);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder UseAutoincrement(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder columnBuilder) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseAutoincrement (columnBuilder As ColumnBuilder) As ColumnBuilder
static member UseAutoincrement : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.ColumnBuilder

Docs.param: The builder for the column being configured.
Docs.summary: Configures the property to use SQLite AUTOINCREMENT feature to generate values for new entities, when targeting SQLite. This method sets the property to be .
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple calls can be chained.
Docs.remarks: AUTOINCREMENT can only be used on integer primary key columns in SQLite. See Modeling entity types and relationships, and Accessing SQLite databases with EF Core for more information and examples.
